title: your thoughts on matchmaking and toxicity/trolls ruining low ELO ranked games
body: you know it's like every game i get a troll or just super toxic inter or feeder. nothing ever gets done. i cannot rank up like this. so frustrating. i'm stuck with players who are 2 iron and im s2. .do you guys think riot cares about low elo play being ruined????

replies.body:
> i'm stuck with players who are 2 iron and im s2

You funny.  Normal notwithstanding, which game do you have Iron player(s) in your Silver elo?  I don't believe you can be matched with people 2 tiers above or below you.

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uOBIoRHE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-15T01:08:07.321+0000)
>
> You funny.  Normal notwithstanding, which game do you have Iron player(s) in your Silver elo?  I don't believe you can be matched with people 2 tiers above or below you.

You can't form a premade with people whose rank is too far from yours, but the matchmaker can put you with them if it deems such to be necessary for matchmaking purposes.

I believe you can if there are huge MMR differences.

I was seeing g4 in my games when I was nearing the end of b1, so it's *possible*.

Ive always wondered about this too. I notice that on 3rd party programs used to mark progress that they can track "Unfortunate" games. In which you do really well but cant carry a team that AFKs or goes 0-15 in 10 minutes. Cant they implement anything that can possibly block your MMR/LP loss at least once if you yourself do well. I wish
